subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets fans arrived in droves, wearing viking hats for Noah Syndergaard and carrying brooms, hoping for a sweep of the Nationals. The result pulled the Mets into a tie atop the National League East.
snippet: Mets fans arrived in droves, wearing viking hats for Noah Syndergaard and carrying brooms, hoping for a sweep of the Nationals. The result pulled the Mets into a tie atop the National League East.
